short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best tool for exporting jobs from indeed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Intro

Indeed Scraper is a powerful tool that allows you to extract all job postings from Indeed in just a few moments. This favorite nugget of online (human resources managers, recruiters) allows you to export offers in a structured format for analysis or database enrichment, thus offering you unparalleled simplicity and speed.

## Traits
Export jobs from indeed
Captcha Auto Detection

## The list of exported columns
1.   - Position Name
2.   - Company
3.   - Company Rating
4.   - Company Review Count
5.   - Salary Min
6.   - Salary Max
7.   - Salary Type
8.   - Salary Currency
9.   - Salary Label
10. - Job Type
11. - Job City
12. - Job Postal
13. - Job State
14. - Job Location
15. - URL
16. - External Apply Link
17. - Posted At
18. - Scraped At
19. - Sponsored
# It's free?

Yes, Indeed Scraper is free. 
You can get basic functionality and upgrade to get more functionality.

# Data confidentiality
All jobs data is processed in your local computer, it never goes through our web server, no one knows what you have discarded.

Questions? Write to us at the email address: indeed.scraper.com@gmail.com or directly on our site from this link https://indeed-scraper.com/contact

# IMPORTANT NOTE:
Indeed Scraper is in no way in partnership with the official indeed site. It is an unofficial application which is independently developed and maintained.

Privacy policy
https://indeed-scraper.com/security-policy
